content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that requires power to function.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, facilitating fluid transport across the map.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure the required items are available in the inventory before attempting to craft. In this case, iron ore is needed to craft iron plates.

### Errors when connecting power
- Make sure to connect the lab to a power source correctly. Check the connections to ensure that the lab is receiving power from the small electric pole.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
